quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
A true relationship is two imperfect people refusing to give up on each other.
In a relationship, when communication starts to fade, everything else follows.
The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.
A great relationship is about two things: First, appreciating the similarities, and second, respecting the differences.
A strong relationship requires choosing to love each other even in those moments when you struggle to like each other.
Relationships are the hallmark of the mature person.
The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is an endless act of love.
The best relationships are the ones you never saw coming.
When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but still hold hands.
A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out, you don't go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.
The extent to which two people in a relationship can bring up and resolve issues is a critical marker of the soundness of a relationship.
Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
A relationship is like a garden. It requires tender care and nurturing. Without it, it withers away.
A healthy relationship will never require you to sacrifice your friends, your dreams, or your dignity.
Intimacy is not purely physical; it's the act of connecting with someone so deeply, you feel like you can see into their soul.
Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
If you want a relationship that looks and feels like the most amazing thing on earth, you need to treat it like it is the most amazing thing on earth.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it, but you can feel it.
To get the full value of joy, you must have someone to divide it with.
The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
You don't develop courage by being happy in your relationships every day. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
The most memorable people in life will be the friends who loved you when you weren't very lovable.
The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
True love is not about perfection, it is hidden in flaws.
Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.
Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.
Love is not what you say. Love is what you do.
The greatest relationships are the ones you never expected to be in.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
In a strong relationship, you should love your companion more than anything else, with all the beauty and imperfections.
